Text: ELOAN Alert Your Year Fixed loan at is available nowMar you asked ELOAN to monitor the mortgage market daily to find the following loans Year Fixed with a interest rate and points We currently offer the following Loan Type Rate PointsRebate APR Year Fixed To take advantage of our great rates go to wwweloancom search for todays up to the minute rates and complete the streamlined online application Your personal loan consultant will call you with a credit decision Your loan consultant will then be your single point of contact throughout the loan process And of course you can monitor your loans progress at your convenience through your passwordprotected ETrack account available online any time To change your Rate Watch settings or to unsubscribe from this email please visit wwweloancomcgibinwatchinput From there you can resubmit your loan watch information or use the delete function to be removed from this email ELOAN A better way to get a home loan Please note that interest rates change daily and that todays rates are subject to change in response to market fluctuations This is not an offer to enter an interest lockin agreement ELOAN is an Equal Housing Lender
